trans-unit.source: You can use an NSG to control traffic to one or more virtual machines (VMs), role instances, network adapters (NICs), or subnets in your virtual network.
trans-unit.target: You can use an NSG to control traffic to one or more virtual machines (VMs), role instances, network adapters (NICs), or subnets in your virtual network.

trans-unit.source: An NSG contains access control rules that allow or deny traffic based on traffic direction, protocol, source address and port, and destination address and port.
trans-unit.target: An NSG contains access control rules that allow or deny traffic based on traffic direction, protocol, source address and port, and destination address and port.

trans-unit.source: The rules of an NSG can be changed at any time, and changes are applied to all associated instances.
trans-unit.target: The rules of an NSG can be changed at any time, and changes are applied to all associated instances.

trans-unit.source: For more information about NSGs, visit [what is an NSG](virtual-networks-nsg.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about NSGs, visit [what is an NSG](virtual-networks-nsg.md).
